FED TO RELEASE U.S. APRIL CONSUMER CREDIT JUNE 5

The Federal Reserve Board said it would release April consumer instalment credit figures on Friday. No fixed time was set for the release. Consumer credit fell a seasonally adjusted 63 mln dlrs in March after rising 1.01 billion dlrs in February. Reuter
